title: Prediction: Olimpija Ljubljana vs Kairat Almaty
description: Verdict: Home win Best odds: 29/50 Bookmaker: ZetBet In the opening leg of the Champions League qualifying first round, NK Olimpija Ljubljana will host Kairat at Stadion Stozice on Tuesday. Olimpija secured top spot in the Slovenian top division last season, collecting 74 points from 36 matches, while Kairat claimed the 2024 Kazakhstan Premier League […] The post Prediction: Olimpija Ljubljana vs Kairat Almaty appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Szczesny extends Barcelona stay until 2027
description: Wojciech Szczesny has extended his contract with Barcelona. The Polish goalkeeper signed a new deal which will see him remain with the LaLiga club until 2027. Szczesny came out of retirement last season to join Barcelona, who lost starting goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen to a long-term injury.
